meanings.definition: A ghost or ghostlike image of a person.
meanings.sent1: The children told stories of spooky apparitions they claimed to have seen in the old house.
meanings.sent2: The horror movie was filled with terrifying apparitions haunting the characters.
meanings.sent3: The friendly ghost decided to dress up as other apparitions for Halloween.
meanings.sent4: The misty morning created eerie apparitions of trees in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house tour guide described the apparitions with chilling detail.

meanings.definition: The appearance of something remarkable or unexpected.
meanings.sent1: The sudden apparitions of colorful balloons in the sky delighted the children.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected apparitions of shooting stars left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved the apparitions of rabbits appearing out of thin air.
meanings.sent4: The apparitions of bright lights in the night sky mesmerized the stargazers.
meanings.sent5: The apparitions of rare flowers blooming in the desert amazed the botanists.
